existing_features.title: Perform a redeploy by rebuilding and upgrading the backend canister, regenerating backend bindings, rebuilding the frontend, and deploying the frontend canister, following the existing redeploy runbook/scripts.

new_feature_requests.summary: Automatic hiding of messages older than an hour (with ability to refine behavior)

projectName: Redeploy backend and frontend canisters (no functional changes)
